verses.roman:
kāhāṅ tumi--sākṣāt īśvara nārāyaṇa
kāhāṅ muñi--rāja-sevī viṣayī śūdrādhama

synonyms: kāhāṅ—whereas; tumi—You; sākṣāt—directly; īśvara nārāyaṇa—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; kāhāṅ—whereas; muñi—I; rāja-sevī—government servant; viṣayī—materialist; śūdra-adhama—worse than a śūdra, or fourth-class man.
translation: "You are the Supreme Personality of Godhead, Nārāyaṇa Himself, and I am only a government servant interested in materialistic activities. Indeed, I am the lowest amongst men of the fourth caste.
